metadata.feature_description: Navigation controls for paginated data in tag statistics and popular content

steps.action: Login to DNN as host user
steps.actual: Successfully logged in as SuperUser Account

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics
steps.expected: Community Analytics panel opens with paginated data sections
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel shows blank/empty - JavaScript error: 'utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function' prevents module from loading

steps.action: Attempt to click next/previous page buttons
steps.actual: Unable to test - no pagination controls visible due to module loading failure

issues: Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.expected: Community Analytics panel loads with pagination controls
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel is blank - module fails to initialize

steps.action: Attempt to jump to a specific page number
steps.actual: Unable to test - pagination controls not accessible due to module loading failure

issues: Community Analytics module fails to load - no UI elements available for testing

steps.expected: Community Analytics panel loads showing current page indicator
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel is blank - module fails to initialize

steps.action: Verify current page indicator is visible and accurate
steps.expected: Current page number is clearly displayed
steps.actual: Unable to test - no pagination elements rendered due to module loading failure

issues: Community Analytics module fails to load - current page indicator cannot be validated

steps.expected: Community Analytics panel loads with page size options
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel is blank - module fails to initialize

steps.action: Verify page size dropdown/options are available
steps.expected: Page size options are visible and selectable
steps.actual: Unable to test - no pagination elements rendered due to module loading failure

issues: Community Analytics module fails to load - page size options cannot be verified

observations: Code review confirmed pagination controls exist in pageActivities.js with prev/next click handlers and pager visibility controls
CommunityAnalyticsController.cs provides API endpoints with pageIndex and pageSize parameters for GetTagStats, GetPopularContent, GetModuleTagStats, and GetModulePopularContent
Community Analytics menu item is properly registered under Dashboard in the PersonaBar
Critical JavaScript error 'TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function' occurs when opening Community Analytics, preventing the module from initializing
The serializeCustomDate function appears to be missing from the utility module, suggesting a dependency issue or code mismatch
All pagination control tests failed because the parent Community Analytics module does not load
